CHANGES
========

0.0.2
------

* pypi-compliant setup.py


0.0.1
------

* edits to LICENSE, README, MANIFEST, CHANGES

0.0.0
------

* Initial release 
* AGPL license in LICENSE.txt
* Do-nothing posix-compliant service
* API keys served in file outside source and production stacks
* BitFloor API interraction works (but not with bitfloor test url)
